snippet.title: Stardust Demon Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2815500/Stardust_Demon/

If you like the look of this game, wishlist it on Steam. It would help us a lot 🤍 

Stardust Demon is a retro metroidvania adventure. It features a mixture of challenges, from platforming to fighting to solving puzzles. Power up with an arsenal of abilities and many hidden upgrades and secrets.

The game features hazardous environments and cozy towns in lovingly-crafted pixel art graphics, retro 3D CGI FMV cutscenes, and eclectic music combining various styles and influences from FM video game synthesis to metal to electronica.
